::KitKat::

She saw Drillbit come up and grab her.  But her mind saw Land Mine 
grab her.  She kicked and punched, trying to get away.  "GO AWAY! GO 
AWAY!"  She twisted around and punched him in the face, thinking it's 
Land Mine she's hitting.  "GO AWAY! LEAVE ME ALONE LAND MINE!"
She struggle with everythng she has to get away.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit heard all the screaming and shots. He ran up to her 
position,
> and saw her running around. He ran up a grabbed her in a hug, 
trying to
> calm her down, and stop her from hurting herself..., or him.
> "Ssshhh! settle down. Its ok!"
> 
> ::K-9::
> 
> K-9 aproched the top of the mountin. He saw KitKat and DrillBit. He
> stayed behind some rocks, under cover.
